description: Activating Liliana of the Veil's +1 with only one card in hand will soft-lock the game

Secret Salvage does not add the cards found from the library to the revealed zone.
The activated ability of Sunforger does not shuffle the library.
If you control Platinum Emperion you cannot even pay 0 life for costs.

Holistic Wisdom restarts the game when you activate it
Tromokratis can cause the game the game to soft-lock in multiplayer games
Leovold, Emissary of Trest incorrectly allows an opponent to choose "Yes" with Sylvan Library, but correctly doesn't allow them to draw extra cards.
The legend rule continues to not apply if you have multiple Brothers Yamazaki tokens from Helm of the Host.
Valduk, Keeper of the Flame does not create an Elemental token if it dies while its ability is on the stack.
Meteor Storm only discards one card if you have exactly two
Dust Elemental only returns two creatures if its controller only controls exactly three creatures (including Dust Elemental itself)
If Rancor falls off a land that was a creature temporarily that turn, it will incorrectly trigger during the next turn's upkeep.
Skullbriar, the Walking Grave can cause the client to crash if it moves to the command zone with +1/+1 counters.
Merfolk Trickster doesn't remove abilities granted to the targeted creature by a different source.
Quicksilver Fountain allows you to place flood counters on nonland permanents.
The triggered ability of Athreos, God of Passage does not return the creature to your hand.
Muldrotha, the Gravetide does not allow you to cast cards from your graveyard with As Foretold.
Sword-Point Diplomacy is buggy in multiplayer
Caller of the Hunt doesn't allow you to pick a creature type
Teferi’s Realm forces you to phase everything out
Doubling Season incorrectly doubles lore counters on sagas placed during the draw step.
Mogg Assassin doesn't kill the opponent's creature on a won flip and doesn't always let both players select a target
Animation Module does not trigger off of cards with unleash such as Gore-House Chainwalker.
Gaddock Teeg incorrectly does not allow cards with converted mana cost 4 or greater to be spliced onto other cards.
If a card such as Phyrexian Revoker that asks you to name a card is manifested, you are asked to name the card as it enters the battlefield.
Clones such as Phyrexian Metamorph are not granted haste by Mimic Vat.
Clones such as Phyrexian Metamorph are not granted haste by Mimic Vat.
Split cards such as Cut // Ribbons are reported as 3 cards in the chat log.

If Heir of Falkenrath's ability is used to transform it into Heir to the Night, then it transforms back into Heir of Falkenrath in the same turn in some way, its activated ability can be used again.
Only the front sides of Archangel Avacyn and Garruk, the Veil-Cursed are taken into account for Commander color identity.
Only the front sides of Archangel Avacyn and Garruk, the Veil-Cursed are taken into account for Commander color identity.
Atarka's Command's first activated ability doesn't appear in the Effect zone after it resolves.
Cards that require a player to remove any number of +1/+1 counters incorrectly do not allow a player to remove any counters.
Cards that require a player to remove any number of +1/+1 counters incorrectly do not allow a player to remove any counters.
Mana Reflection doesn't double mana produced by mana abilities that provide mana in any combination of colors

If Kaya, Ghost Assassin exiles a commander with the first ability, and its controller chooses not to replace exile with the command zone, the commander will still go to the command zone until Kaya returns it.
Barren Glory does not check intervening if clause during resolution
You can't cast Spinning Darkness for its alternate cost
Reviving Vapors doesn't cause you to gain life.
Psychotic Episode The card on top of the library isn't displayed in the revealed zone
The calculation code seems to be wrong, because one third of three (3) is calculated as two (2)
All creatures searched using Weird Harvest's ability will end in the hand of the last priority player
Some protection abilities granted by Concerted Effort are not shown visually on creatures
Phyrexian Portal doesn't let the owner see the pile they have chosen or choose a card

If control of Grave Betrayal or  Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker changes between a creature dying and the delayed EOT trigger going on the stack, the new controller gets the creature rather than the player who created the delayed trigger.

Rogue Skycaptain's upkeep cost is {0}.
[Overabundance] can't add colorless mana, therefore keeping players from using lands that only tap for colorless
If you cast a card you don't own with Primal Wellspring, the copy is cast by the card's owner.

Some spells that let you look at the top cards of your library and choose multiple cards one-by-one to send to the graveyard will incorrectly display the visual order of the chosen cards in the graveyard.

You are unable to cast split cards with Mindclaw Shaman's ability.

If Fire Covenant is cast for x=0 and you pay the 1 extra mana that MTGO asks you to (which is the bug), the game will restarts. Workaround: Undo the process if you encounter this bug, and never cast it for x=0
When you change the color in a card's text, the card won't show the new chosen color in the cards itself, in the tooltip, and not in the zoomed version

The second Reflector Mage played in the same turn will let the first one’s target able to be cast.
Angelic Field Marshal still grants a bonus to your commander when an opponent gains control of it.
Withdraw is able to target the same creature twice.
Creatures with ascend can still grant the City's Blessing with Overwhelming Splendor on the battlefield.
Sin Prodder's upkeep trigger damage isn't associated with Sin Prodder.
Cards that ask you to choose "a basic land type or a color word" only let you choose a basic land type.
Cards that ask you to choose "a basic land type or a color word" only let you choose a basic land type.
Fa'adiyah Seer and Sindbad's ability won't discard non-land card drawn if there is any dredge card in your graveyard

Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith will sometimes give the equipment it finds to another player's hand.
Instead of bouncing an enchantment, attacking with Floodtide Serpent shows you all zones.
The art for the tokens created by [Godsire] is incorrect.
Lavamancer's Skill the "T: deal 1 damage" ability does not let you choose a target
[Sages of the Anima] puts the non-creature cards on top of the library instead of the bottom.

Mutiny doesn't have clear targeting information. Workaround: The game log displays targets matching the order written on the card, and will highlight the appropriate creature when its name is hovered over with the mouse.
Casting a second Midnight Oil does not reset your hand size limit
Thran Turbine mana is able to be used to cast spells
When Entreat the Angels is on the stack with 0 chosen for X, the blue text that typically indicates the value of X does not appear.
Rosheen Meanderer is unable to contribute mana to spells that ask an opponent to pay X, such as Condescend.

If Vesuva copies a land with a static ability and then is later turned into a basic land (perhaps by a Blood Moon or Spreading Seas), that static ability will not be removed. Triggered and activated abilities are correctly removed.

The art for the token created by Sound the Call is incorrect.
The art for the wolf token created by Garruk, the Veil-Cursed is incorrect.
Samurai of the Pale Curtain does not exile tokens.

If some (not all) of Terastodon's targets are indestructible permanent(s), it will incorrectly create elephant token(s) for the owner of those permanents.
Austere Command does not respect 711.4b and treats the converted mana cost of the back side of double-faced permanents as 0.
If all of Yisan, the Wanderer Bard's verse counters are removed in response to its ability, you are able to search your library for any creature, regardless of CMC.
All lands fetched using Borderland Explorer's ETB ability, regardless of who owns it, will ends up in Borderland's controller hand, but those lands can't be played or discarded
All lands fetched using Borderland Explorer's ETB ability, regardless of who owns it, will ends up in Borderland's controller hand, but those lands can't be played or discarded
Knowledge Pool With multiple Knowledge Pools in play, casting a spell from hand lets you cast a spell from each Pool.
Orcish Spy and cards with similar abilities show the cards in alphabetical order, not the actual order
Dredging rather than drawing can let you avoid discarding
[Volcano Hellion] Damage is capped at 255

When there are floating generic mana and restricted mana (such as [Mishra's Workshop] mana) that are same color (or same colorless), MTGO will always use generic mana first before using the restricted mana. Workaround: don't float the generic mana if you want to use the restricted mana first
[Sheltering Ancient]'s Cumulative Upkeep Stops Working After One Age Counter
Vexing Sphinx's Cumulative Upkeep Doesn't Make You Discard
[Jodah's Avenger] Activated ability continues activating infinitely.
Lurking Evil makes you pay life equal to half of your opponent's life total
If Phantom Tiger dies in combat, blue text abilities it had been granted do not apply to that combat's damage.
If a player casts Reflector Mage targeting a creature they own, and then in the following turn their opponent casts Reflector Mage, they are able to immediately recast that creature.
Words of Waste does not function.
The Ur-Dragon also reduces its own casting cost.
Kess Dissident Mage's ability allows you to cast spells during other players' turns and to cast spells with no mana costs
While Scythe of the Wretched is unequipped, it reanimates any creature that happens to die.
If Vesuvan Shapeshifter copies a Megamorph creature with it's face-up ability, it will retain the Megamorph ability in later turns, gaining +1/+1 counters.
Casting Sylvan Primordial causes the game to be soft-locked in a multiplayer game if there are no legal targets for one player.
If Deceiver of Form's triggered ability turns creatures into copies of a legendary creature, the legend rule fails to apply to the copies.

The mana abilities of Wall of Roots and Kozilek's Translator cannot be activated while paying the mana cost of a spell or ability. Players can still activate these abilities at any time that player has priority.

Harsh Mentor's triggered ability also affects abilities activated from creatures in the graveyard.
Death Pit Offering sacrifices all of its owner’s permanents, not just creatures
If you target an [Icefall Regent] with a fused split card, you must pay {2} for each side of the split card, for a total of {4}
Ricochet Trap restarts the game when cast for its alternate cost.
Certain cards, such as Hada Freeblade, do not display a legality error for the Pauper format in the collection scene.
There are known issues with giving flashback to a spell that is put on the bottom of a library as it resolves.

Gishath, Sun's Avatar does not allow you to decline to put a Dinosaur creature into play if you have one in your hand.
Collected Company does not allow you to put fewer than the maximum number of creatures onto the battlefield.
Commandeer does not gain control of the targeted noncreature spell.
Rimescale Dragon does not place an Ice Counter on targeted creatures.
As Foretold does not apply to cards able to be cast due to Abandoned Sarcophagus.
Goblin Game reveals your chosen number before your opponents choose.
Using Oriss, Samite Guardian's Grandeur ability during controller's precombat main phase will not allow controller to attack that turn.
If Containment Priest and Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite are both Exhumed, Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite is exiled and her effect lasts indefinitely.
Prince of Thralls asks its owner to pay life instead of the opponent.
The undo function works incorrectly with Torment of Hailfire.
Tomorrow, Azami's Familiar puts both unchosen cards back on top of the library.
Booby Trap does not let you name anything other than non-basic lands.
Compost The effect isn't triggered when an opponent only casts the nonblack half of a split card.
Liquid Fire doesn't let you choose how to deal damage - it all goes to player
Vizier of Many Faces keeps its abilities when an opponent controls Overwhelming Splendor.
If a commander is chosen for Riches in Rags // Riches, no other opponents need to choose a creature.
Sunscourge Champion will cause you to lose life if it has negative power when its trigger resolves.
Multani's Presence incorrectly draws cards off copies of spells that are countered
[Freyalise's Winds] Anytime a permanent with a wind counter would be untapped outside of the untap step,  a wind counter is removed rather than it becoming untapped.
Chandra Nalaar Ultimate ability (Chandra's -8) does not count as damage from a planeswalker.
Cursed Scroll does not deal damage if choosing to click the card in your hand, rather than typing the name.
Hollow One's cost reduction doesn't consider split cards that are discarded
[Structural Collapse] doesn't cause target to sacrifice either an artifact or land.
If you manifest a creature with Grafdigger's Cage in play, it will be exiled.
Containment Priest exiles Theros Gods even when their devotion isn't met.
When controlling the Emblem of Koth of the Hammer, lands do not display the blue text they have.
Mirror Match Non-creature permanents that become creatures temporarily are incorrectly considered blocked by the token copies
Storage Matrix Selecting yes to anything other than artifacts with two Storage Matrices in play causes the game to soft lock.
Casting a second copy of Gideon's Intervention causes the first to become become partially non-functional, allowing the named card to deal damage
Identity Thief Restarts the game when attempting to copy a creature.
Non-land permanents that have become lands due to an enchantment, such as Imprisoned in the Moon, do not trigger the third ability of The Gitrog Monster when put into the graveyard
When Vizier of Many Faces copies a token creature that was created with embalm, the Vizier will display with no art.
Thornbow Archer Incorrectly grants 1 life to opponents that do not control an Elf, rather than causing them to lose 1 life.
Unscythe, Killer of Kings's effect procs when unequipped.
Island Sanctuary's replacement effect is available if you draw a card during an opponents draw step
Spoils of Victory The land comes into play tapped
[Semblance Anvil] imprinting a split card does not reduce any casting costs.
Athreos, God of Passage does not associate its triggers with specific creatures.
Riptide Replicator tokens use incorrect art and incorrectly display they have the changeling ability.
Custodi Lich's sacrifice trigger happens when you create the monarchy, and whenever an opponent becomes the monarch.
Synthetic Destiny and Mass Polymorph do not take commanders into account when determining the number of creatures to reveal.

Reflecting Pool does not get the ability to add any color of mana to your mana pool from Crumbling Vestige.

[Nebuchadnezzar] ability makes the game start endlessly repeating itself
[Primitive Justice] will either not cast/restart the game with a single target.
If [Living Lore] imprints a Split Card, it has twice the expected CMC.

[High Seas] only affects red creature spells.
